casebody.data:
No. 10-9202. Lloyd Chase Allen, Petitioner v. Edwin G. Buss, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections. 563 U.S. 976, 131 S. Ct. 2898,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1192,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3455. May 2, 2011.

Petition for writ of certio-rari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.

Same case below, 611 F.3d 740.
